page.title: 06LONGFORGAN - THE KNAPP I -
page.content: The Knapp village known locally as "the Knapp", consists of a dozen or so houses. Formerly an estate village, most houses are now privately owned by professional people who work in Dundee.It is rural in character and yet only 15 minutes by car from the city. This makes it a very much sought after residential area. The Knapp village has partly lost its sense of community. Its size and lack of a natural meeting place such as a shop or bus stop, and the dependence on cars have isolated its residents. As a result all social activities are held in the larger surrounding villages. The Knapp burn and the areas mature woodland, part of which has been very recently harvested and replanted still supports a variety of wildlife, and makes it a very pleasant place in which to live and raise a family.
